  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_528</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_528</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Proporcionalidad numérica</string>
            <string language="en">Numerical proportionality</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Numerische Proportionatität</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Proportionnalité numérique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Proportionality numérico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Proporzionalità numerica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αριθμητική αναλογικότητα</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el concepto de proporcionalidad numérica. Se estudia la regla de tres simple y compuesta y se utilizan los conocimientos para aplicarlos al cálculo de repartos proporcionales y el cálculo del interés simple y compuesto.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to study the concept of numerical proportionality. It studies the simple and compound rule of three and uses these concepts to apply them to the calculation of proportional distributions and the calculation of simple and compound interest rates.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">regla de tres</string>
            <string language="en">rule of three</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">proporcionalidad</string>
            <string language="en">proportionality</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">inversa</string>
            <string language="en">inverse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">interés</string>
            <string language="en">interest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">directa</string>
            <string language="en">direct</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, das Konzept der numerischen Proportionatität zu 
studieren. Sie studiert die einfache und zusammengesetzte 
Richtlinie von drei und verwendet diese Konzepte, um sie an der 
Berechnung der proportionalen Verteilungen und an der Berechnung von 
Kinetik des einfachen und Zinseszinses anzuwenden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'étudier le concept de la proportionnalité numérique. 
Elle étudie la règle simple et composée de trois et emploie 
ces concepts pour s'appliquer les au calcul des distributions 
proportionnelles et au calcul des taux d'intérêt d'intérêt simple 
et composé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações estudar o
conceito do proportionality numérico. Estuda a régua simples e
composta de três e usa estes conceitos aplicá-los ao cálculo de 
distribuições proporcionais e ao cálculo de taxas de interesse 
simples e composto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
studiare il concetto della proporzionalità numerica. Studia la 
regola semplice e compound di tre ed usa questi concetti per 
applicarla al calcolo delle distribuzioni proporzionali ed al calcolo 
dei tassi di interesse semplice e compound.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να μελετήσει την έννοια της αριθμητικής αναλογικότητας. 
Μελετά τον απλό και σύνθετο κανόνα τριών και χρησιμοποιεί 
αυτές τις έννοιες για να τις εφαρμόσει στον υπολογισμό των 
ανάλογων διανομών και τον υπολογισμό των απλών και σύνθετων 
επιτοκίων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Richtlinie von drei</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Proportionatität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">umgekehrt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interesse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">direkt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">règle de trois</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">proportionnalité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">inverse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">intérêt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">direct</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">régua de três</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">proportionality</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">inverso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">interesse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">direto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">una regola di tre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">proporzionalità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">inverso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">diretto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κανόνας τριών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αναλογικότητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-el">ενδιαφέρον</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άμεσος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
